nodes.text: Daz was a male Human corporal serving the Galactic Republic during the Cold War. He sold combat gear aboard Carrick Station.

Daz first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Taris planetary commendation vendor aboard Carrick Station. He was later relabeled as the Level 17 Equipment Vendor, though he was later removed along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
